💰 specific funding for fence line, tribal, and disadvantaged communities
😮‍💨 focused funding for pollution monitoring
😷 reinstating superfund taxes on polluters

The #IRA also includes $60 billion going directly to American job creators to clean up our industrial sector by providing:
🏭 tax credits for clean manufacturing
🗑️ incentives for gas emission & waste reduction programs
🧑‍🏭 funding to use the Defense Production Act

Buildings are the 4th largest source of climate pollution. We must work toward reducing our footprint and emissions, here's how we build more sustainably:
 
💡 Rebates/tax credits for energy-efficient appliances and electrification
🏛️ Funding for greener federal buildings

The biggest share of our greenhouse gas emissions comes from the transportation sector. That’s why the #IRA provides:
🚘 electric car tax credits
🛻 investments in cleaner heavy-duty trucks
🚔 funding for a green federal fleet
✈️ incentivizes cleaner air travel

✅ Includes clean energy tax credits to help you pay for roof solar
✅ Creates @ENERGY loan guarantees that increase private clean energy investments
✅ Increases clean energy funding to rural communities

📉 lowering energy costs
